body:
Closes #11781 

Use `spack-build-<type>.txt` for `log` and `env` filenames, where `<type>` is `out` and `env` respectively.  

Addendum:  Install `log` and `env` filenames should have the same form.

- [x] Support build filename backward compatibility (did build and install)
- [x] Ensure metadata (sub)directory exists prior to installing build log and env files 
- [x] Rename `check_removal` to `check_viewdir_removal` in cmd/env.py tests
- [x] Clarify package build/install path property docstrings
- [x] Remove unused `mock_log` from `install.py` tests
- [x] Remove unused `spec` is `None` from `directory_layout`s `metadata_path` and `build_packages_path`
title: Rename build logs (#11781)
